website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, versatile, and well-built range hood that won't break your budget.
pros: Seamless design complements a variety of kitchens
Boasts a high-quality 140-watt motor that delivers unmatched performance
Sold with multi-layer aluminum mesh filters that can be washed by hand
Comes with long-lasting 3-watt LEDs to increase visibility while cooking
cons: Does not ventilate as well as comparable units

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice looking unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking unit. It is simple in design. It is much more quiet than a Whirlpool microwave- fan unit I have in another house. This unit can be vented to the outside via top or rear. The lights are LED which is a big plus. I would buy this again and I highly recommend the unit.
customer_reviews.author: compass69

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts, Proprietary Design and Doesn't Seem to Work Well
customer_reviews.text: I got everything assembled to find out that the exhaust was a proprietary 2x9.5'' rectangle (probably for ease of manufacturing), so an adapter was necessary. The local hardware store didn't have it, so I had to make one. Once that and the electrical wiring was done (no plug was included), I got the guy running. The fan was quite loud and didn't offer good ventilation, I thought it was because I hadn't installed the aluminum filters only to find out they weren't included or forgotten. Yikes, all that hard work for a weak fan with a proprietary design with missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Choe

customer_reviews.title: Too Dim, too narrow, needs 90 degree plug.
customer_reviews.text: The lights are dimmer than a good night light and are not the right color. Totally unusable to cook under. The hood is 29.5 inches. I know it needs space to clear the cabinets without damaging them, but it does NOT need that much space. Leaves a quarter inch on either side of the hood. The plug should be a 90 degree plug to make it less likely that the duct (which is toward the rear of the unit instaed of centered on 6 inches) will not interfere with being able to plug the unit in. Unit looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Boburk

customer_reviews.title: 5U30 30in under-cabinet hood led lights
customer_reviews.text: mfg quality is good, like the 3 speed fan, installation was okay, replaced a 14 year old exhaust fan, some modifications to existing exhaust duct work, and existing electrical power to match the new hood. the led lights are absolutely worthless in light level for cooking food on range top. lights lumens barely meet the requirements for a night light in total darkness. would not recommend this hood unless there was plenty of light in kitchen ceiling because the led lights are not bright enough. the only way you can tell they are on is by the bulb reflection on range top surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great looking under cabinet rang hood for the price light ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking under cabinet rang hood for the price light could be brighter but usable my kitchen is not dark fan is quitter then my last fan it came in on time with amazon prime packing was well protected made it throw with out any issue I've only just installed it and so far no issues but will update if any arise.
customer_reviews.author: walphy

customer_reviews.title: Love it...couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Received and installed my Cosmo Range hood today. Installation wasn't terribly difficult...you will need to pick up a 120V plug and attach to the power cord. It's just 3 wires so anyone with even an inkling of electrical knowledge won't have trouble. The fan has 3 speeds and the high speed is certainly not as loud as my previous range hood. The stainless matches really well with the Broan splash guard that I installed under it. It also matches the Bosch dishwasher. The light isn't super bright but seems to be sufficient. Wish it was a warmer light but I guess when cooking the cool white will work well. So far so good. Will update if I have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Donavon Maupin

customer_reviews.title: Fan not strong enough.
customer_reviews.text: Not difficult to install but I did have to reroute the wiring to make it work with existing power supply. The electrical wiring comes out of the top left side of the hood. The fan however is not powerful enough. You can see from the photo the amount of steam that is escaping the hood. Not that big of a deal when it's just steam but it is a problem with bacon grease! Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: The truth.
customer_reviews.text: The range hood itself looks great no issues there. But the lights are horrible, all the night lights in my house are brighter than these lights in this hood. For the fan, it is rather loud, but I’m fine with that as long as it sucks the smoke or steam out. But it does a half way job. When boiling water the steam is about half goin in the hood and half in the kitchen and that’s with the fan on high, the front of the hood is wet from all the steam and dripping. All in all I am not happy at all with the purchase and would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Lights are underwhelming.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: + This hood came packaged and protected well. + Arrived quickly. + Very easy to install. + Carbon filter (purchased separately) fits and functions well. + Looks good, exactly as described. + Good fan. Very easy to switch from internal to external exhaust. Cons: - The two lights are very underwhelming. They are cool white, but not very bright at all. Honestly, they don't add much illumination to the cooking surface beyond that of our regular ceiling lights. This frustrates my wife immensely, who is admittedly a light addict. - Amazon description says that the filters are dishwasher safe while the instruction manual says that they are not.
customer_reviews.author: True2BSU

customer_reviews.title: I had such high hopes with the reviewa
customer_reviews.text: It was installed yesterday with brand new cabinets and all. First all I was boiling was a small pot of water and the fan barely did anything to the steam. The steam was basically just rolling over the vent and all over my cabinets above. (so basically I will have to have extra protection on my cabinets) second the lights are a joke. My husband who tried to make light of my decision... Started messing with it and then turned the lights on, he had to even laugh. Don't waste your money spend the extra. Unfortunately now that its installed I'm no longer eligible for return
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Nice quite unit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for an old non working unit. Upon opening the box I thought I had gotten the wrong item and couldn’t find instructions or the covers to make it ductless. After removing the filters I found everything stored inside the unit. Followed the instructions and installed the unit as directed. Never understood how to us the supplied template for the screw so I just had someone mark the holes while I held it in place. This unit is very quiet and I purchased the carbon filter. We will see how well it works. Lights are not very bright so that Is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: scott genovese

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite As Described
customer_reviews.text: Although this is sold as a 30" unit - which is what I was replacing, it is only 29 1/2 inches. Not a big deal, but adds the need for filler molding and some challenges connecting to the original ducting. The LED lights are woefully inadequate. If you expected this hood to provide additional light, think again. It is not going to get it done. When you head to the local hardware store to get the molding to fill the gaps, pick-up some additional undercounter lighting as well. If it was not such a pain to uninstall it, box it up and ship it back, I would be looking for a replacement. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Libby

customer_reviews.title: Low light and fan speed
customer_reviews.text: It looks good when mounted, like a lot of reviews stated before, its quiet, I think that's because the vent fan is not that powerful. The biggest issue for me with this hood is that the LED lights are pretty much useless. I'm looking to see if there is a way to replace them. They are not normal over-the-counter type lights that you can purchase from a store. I was really not concerned about how the unit looked because it will be covered with the vent Hood cover. I think the unit looks about the same as it cost. You get what you pay for. If I could see the lights it would be a solid 3 or 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Velton Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: So far, well satisfied. Has clean, simple lines. We replaced a huge ugly microwave and have yet to install a grease guard behind the stove, but it otherwise looks great. I worried the stainless steel would be so shiny that it glared or would catch the eye but it doesn't. Only complaint is the off button makes a loud click. It comes with a 3-prong plug on the end of the cord, so no hard-wiring needed. LED lights could be brighter (or, more of them) but so far they're adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Earthling

customer_reviews.title: For Looks Only
customer_reviews.text: The folks writing this 5 star reviews must be getting a different unit than the one we got. It's really for looks if you need to fill a hole above your range as the fan doesn't move any air to be of use and the lights really are purple like others had complained about. I just can't imagine anyone being okay with purples lights as that's going to look really awful while cooking. One last nitpick is the plastic covering that comes on the hood from the factory. Its a real struggle to get it off and once you do it leaves a nasty looking smudge than doesn't come off even with cleaning. We are very disappointed with this hood.
customer_reviews.author: Ja

customer_reviews.title: Better Quality than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised and the quality of the overall unit. Stainless steel was perfectly assembled, edges in perfect shape with no bad welds. Everyone coming into our kitchen comments oh how nice the hood looks and thinks we spent $$$$$ between the cost of the hood and having it installed. The lights are better than the old hood as they are brighter and cover the whole range top better than the old single bulb from our old unit! Overall happy with the quality, stainless finish, and its look installed.
customer_reviews.author: Viper_rt1996

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to kitchen remodel
customer_reviews.text: I like my new SS hood vent, it is a nice addition to my still in progress kitchen remodel. I haven’t used it yet, but just trying it out the low vent cycle is fairly quiet. I like having 3 speed options, my other only had high/low. The underneath lights put off a good amount of needed light. My husband and I were able to hardwire and install it ourselves (had a neighbor come over to help hold it up while my husband screwed it into the cabinet). Installation instructions say to “Use the 4 screws to mount”, but I had to use my own screws.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Hood and Value
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and it looks fantastic! Read some reviews about the low level of light put out but I don't think it is low at all. It lights up the cooking surface great. Installation was a snap, external venting lined up perfectly and the wire routing easily converts from a top feed to a rear one. I can't imagine you'll find a better value, quality or appearance hood for the money. Highly recomend this hood.
customer_reviews.author: A P.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this unit and when it arrived it had several smudges and scratches of the front panel. Amazon quickly replaced the unit. Finally got the replacement installed and turned on everything to check it. Sound levels are not bad and the lighting looks like a cool, soft-white. Since we just installed it, we cannot review the suction power as of yet. we ordered the carbon filter so hopefully it will do a much better job than the last two we had. The last two only had the aluminum filter screens.
customer_reviews.author: Myran Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cosmo 5U30" Under the Cabinet/Over the Stove Fan & Light
customer_reviews.text: I like the Cosmo under the cabinet fan and light. It is pretty. Was easy to install. Is easy to keep clean. My compliant is that the LED lights are too dim. Some of the other people who reviewed this said that either the lights were bright enough for them while others said they were too dim. I was hoping that I would get the bright lights but I got the dim ones instead. I know I can change the LED lights out sometime so not really a problem. The unit is clean and functional; with a light switch, three levels of fan speed and an off button. Works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieLu!

customer_reviews.title: not a 30 inch hood as described, but for the price its ok
customer_reviews.text: american over the range cabinets are all 30". most hoods fit tightly inside that opening under the cabinet. this hood has an annoying 1/4 inch gap on each side. if you read the fine print it does say the actual measurement is 29.5 inches, but the title of the listing is Cosmo 5U30 30-in Under-Cabinet Range Hood 250-CFM. Maybe put an asterix beside the 30 inch? especially since the industry standard is a full 30 inch width. the gap is going to be really hard to keep clean. I would not have purchased it had I realized, but its installed now, so its not going back.
customer_reviews.author: brian hammett

customer_reviews.title: Lights shine VERY feebly on our cooktop
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this hood for our new induction cooktop; the two lights in the hood barely make a difference in illuminating the cooking service while the markings designating what the buttons controlled wiped away during the first GENTLE, no-abrasives-used cleaning. We heartily recommend you reading this NOT to purchase this Cosmo unless you are an expert in Braille cooking.....
customer_reviews.author: Eric Leber

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: First I do not thing it is really stainless steel, because the surface looks and brightness change with grease. And when you clean the surface, although it is almost new, never have the initial bright, clean looks. I am totally disappointed, especially I spent more money to have it install and it is now hard to return it. The lights are totally useless as well! I am glad that I don’t have to relay on this, because there is a strong wall ventilation fan in my kitchen. I would never buy anything from Cosmo!
customer_reviews.author: Mim

customer_reviews.title: Light leaves a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: So far the exhaust works great. I have not done any heavy cooking since the install, so I cannot comment yet on its smoke or odor reduction. We did a ductless install. The light is little more than a night light, so not really useful in our already light deprived kitchen....but it seems that most range hoods with led lights are similar. Perhaps they think everyone is fortunate enough to have light-filled kitchens. But I will compromise as long as the smoke detector doesn't go off every time I sear tuna!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.  Not so fast!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the hood and haven't installed yet. Appears to be in good shape—packaged very well. I have plugged it in to make sure it operates, and it does. The only problem I may have is the LED lights appear not bright enough to light the range surface, but I'll reserve judgement until I have the hood installed. UPDATE: Nice hood and fan. As I suspected, the LED lights are useless. Have returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: BlakeM

customer_reviews.title: a few design flaws
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good range hood: Pros: great style, works fine, low profile, powerful, quiet, very easy install. Cons: Cord is black, thick and very short. The cord is about 2 feet from the lower edge , so requires extension. Lights: Terrible : very low power blue lights. Amount light they produce is borderline useless. Blue color gives food blue tone so it;s impossible to judge if anything is cooked as it alters the food appearance. Since the hood is blocking overhead kitchen light - 2 stars off.
customer_reviews.author: Alexanderos

customer_reviews.title: Very nice range hood
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a noisy Broan hood with the Cosmos hood and it has much better aluminum filters and is much quieter. I installed it all by myself without much difficulty and it looks and operates very satisfactorily. I would say that this is all the average homeowner needs as far as CFM and will be pleased with the quality and the price. Very long warranty as well! The one drawback is that the lights do not light up the back burners well. I would be wise to make the screens smaller and add lights at the back of the hood too.
customer_reviews.author: Grant R. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love the squirrel cage fan...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a lot of range hoods over the 6 decades I’ve been cooking. Mostly the big names. Never had one I really liked... until now. This is the best, quietest, most effective, easiest to clean... etc etc range hood I’ve ever used.. did I mention best looking.. and inexpensive. Don’t bother looking at those big name hoods. You’ll love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to the fact that the actual width is only 29.5" (I failed to notice that until time of install). The vent looks good and does the job, but the buttons are a little odd: light button works independently from the "power" button which turns off a selected vent speed. I guess it just makes sense to me that if the light button is a toggle, why not the rest of the buttons? No big deal though. Even on highest speed, the vent doesn't pull in vapors as well as I thought it would (vent installed at minimum recommended distance from stove top). I guess 250 CFM isn't high enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement range hood
customer_reviews.text: The hood comes extremely well packed. Conversion from rectangular venting to round was relatively easy. Comes wired with cord and plug so had to install an outlet for it. Very attractive and excellent lighting. Filters very easy to remove and clean. Well engineered. Most difficult part is peeling off the blue protective film.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS J SCHOMER

customer_reviews.title: Required Modification
customer_reviews.text: While installing this hood fan using the rectangular (10x3) vent for top ventalation, I realized the damper would not open using this common installation method. I had to cut both sides of the damper so it would open with the duct in place. This is a basic design flaw that should never happen. I can't imagine how many people must have installed this hood only to have the damper almost fully closed under normal use. Other than that, worked OK.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to install and use. We put this in the former spot for the microwave during a kitchen renovation. I disconnected the receptacle for the microwave and hardwired this into the junction box and with a cover. While I don't expect it to remove all cooking smells etc., it does a great job of venting out. I was a little concerned the lighting might be poor from other reviews, but found it to be fine. Although I installed this by myself just fine, another person would have made this super easy to line up and hold steady while screwing in to the under cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this hood!
customer_reviews.text: As much as I wanted to like this hood, I would not recommend anyone purchase it. It’s a nice looking unit and has a pretty decent fan, but the lights in the hood shouldn’t even be called lights! I’ve seen glow sticks that are brighter! If you require good light over your stove, stay away from this range hood. When I called them to see if I could install brighter bulbs, they told me that the lights are proprietary and they are the only lights that will fit this unit. When I uninstalled the lights, I found that they are sealed units with no bulb accessible. This is a serious design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, not too loud.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, not too loud. The lights are good lighting to cook by and as a night light. The anchors were not good for the purpose. Used heavier duty ones. Overall, good buy. It came with the power cord attached, which was a huge plus. The item description did not indicate this and I ordered a cord. So DO NOT order a cord until you know for sure that you need one.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita E Key

customer_reviews.title: It did not say you needed an electrical outlet to plug it in
customer_reviews.text: I assumed when I bought this that it was hardwired like most are. When my handyman pulled it out of the box, he showed me the plug!!!! Now I have to have an electrical box put up there for this thing and the suction area is round. The previous one was square so that has to be changed out also. This was too much hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice priced vent hood with 5 year limited warranty---what a plus!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Cosmo 5u30 I unpacked the vent hood and saw that it does have an area for a top vent but I still need to see how to vent this range hood out the back. it did have a 3prong plug attached. It was packaged nicely and I received it in about 2 days and I do NOT have amazon prime. I will update once it is installed regarding suction power and ease of installation as well as noise level. I purchased this based on overall positive reviews so we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: M S

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Well Made Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: My husband recently installed the Cosmo under cabinet range hood model COS-5U30. I am very pleased with the overall look and operation of the unit, and the installation instructions were easy to follow. The three speed fan is very effective and runs quietly, even on the high setting and the LED lights cast the perfect amount of light on the stove top surface so you can clearly see what you are doing. I would highly recommend this unit to others who are looking for an attractive and well constructed range hood.
customer_reviews.author: Pden

customer_reviews.title: Best Under Cabinet Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: I really love this under cabinet range hood. I did a lot of research to find the perfect under cabinet range hood; I looked on the websites of all the major home improvement stores and all offered did not satisfy what I was looking for to complement my kitchen. The Cosmo 5U30-30 Under Cabinet Range Hood had everything I was looking for; stylish, stainless steel, three speeds, quiet, washable mesh filters and soft lighting, not to forget the price was great. I would have given the install five stars, the description said the hood came with a charcoal filter. The filter was not included in the packaging. This was misleading. I had to purchase separately and additional $20.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Hart

customer_reviews.title: This works great, lighting is ok but i would like it ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great , lighting is ok but i would like it brighter. Replacing lights with brighter leds looks like a pain to find if at all. Had to move electrical but wasn't a problem. And with an extra pair of hands wasnt bad to screw in place. By yourself it would be. My only issue was the unit i got was in great condition but it was an open box item. Which i knew because film that should have been on stainless want there. But item was like new so I'm not going to complain. But if i pay for new i want new.
customer_reviews.author: bigdaddyp33

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS HOOD - TERRIBLE LIGHTING
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS A WASTE OF MY TIME - Dear Amazon. Why would you consider doing business with a company like this. We take the time to remove our old hood. Install the new one to find out that the lighting is so bad that it is basically unusable. We call the manufacturer to be told that there is no solving the problem and that they would take our information and get a hold of us when they came up with a solution. This type of behaviour by a manufacturer is unacceptable whether it's from China or US for that matter. Why would you back this kind of business Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: A & B Audio Video

customer_reviews.title: Works great and very impressed with packaging (no dents).
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived and I was extremely impressed by how well it was packaged. I was concerned about ordering a stainless steel appliance over the internet and how it would survive shipping. It arrived perfect. It works great, very little noise and was a piece of cake to install. They even provide templates for the mounting screw positions on some of the packing cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: mjh

customer_reviews.title: Under cabinet range hood vent
customer_reviews.text: Love it, easy to install, very nice LED lights are bright and a very nice upgrade to our kitchen. 3 speed fan, carbon filter and washable stainless steel filters. Simple instructions, easy to follow, no issues easy to clean. WE did our home work before buying we saved by buying at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Beaven

customer_reviews.title: Height is incorrect, more closer to 5.5 inches
customer_reviews.text: Height is listed as 4.9 inches, but it's more closer to 5.5 inches. This may not be a big issue to most, but I live in a house where the seller had a lot of things custom made and not to standard size, including the backsplash behind the stove which gave about exactly 5 inches of clearance. I still was able to make this work, but it was an inconvenience for me and why I knocked off some stars.
customer_reviews.author: JanJin

customer_reviews.title: Great looking hood!
customer_reviews.text: This hood TOTALLY updated the look! Furthermore, it helped suck a lot of heat away from the stove area, not 100%, but way better than the previous non-functional hood; very important to us in this 80-95 degree 'bake oven' heat. It would be a truly GREAT product if the LED lights had any umphf, maybe they might make an 'ok' night light for the lamp power of the LED. I like to SEE what's cooking. I asked my husband to replace the LEDs IMMEDIATELY, just hoping the appliance can take more powerful LEDs. Um, also, the installation book does NOT give the size / type of LED for replacement. Contacting the company for that info.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super bright!!
customer_reviews.text: super bright, very slim design, easy to install. BUT. Not that easy to get back out if you need to paint. The springs are so tight I thought I would break the drywall trying to get it out. And then one spring popped out of the holder and it was very hard to pinch it and get it back in place. I would probably still buy it again tho.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Wish it had brighter lighting.
customer_reviews.text: Unit was easy to install. Comes with plug. Had to cut it and used wire nuts to connect to old wiring. I only wish it had brighter LED lighting. The two on the corners are adequate for a night light but not for cooking or lighting the stove top. Thats why on 4 stars. value is great for the price and nice filter area where it is all covered underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Lights Way Too Blue!!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, for the price point, this range hood is okay. Disappointed if falls well short of 30" in width - plan on shimming somehow. Also, disappointed the lights are a harsh "blue" - no exaggeration they are distinctly blue and only one setting for on/off no hi/lo setting.
customer_reviews.author: Coolbreez

customer_reviews.title: In dark on this one😂
customer_reviews.text: Notes: came with 3 pronged plug and is 29.5 inches wide Pro: looks good. Quiet! Con: the lights are too dim to be of any use except as dim! night light. Had to order replacement lights for a different make in hopes of making lights useable for cooking. Range hoods have2 design functions. Fan and lights. Would sound simple. 👎
customer_reviews.author: no fiction

customer_reviews.title: Horrible no suction
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, on high it couldn't suck up the steam from boiling water. The product is 1/2 inch smaller than stated size, the light is extremely dim. Did I mention the suction is like nothing??! On high, maaaybe sucked up 1/3 up steam from boiling water on stove. Worst vent ever. And mine is vented.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Meloro

customer_reviews.title: Came dented in the box
customer_reviews.text: This vent came dented in the box. I thought that maybe it was from shipping but after inspecting the box there was no damage at all on the box. Can only assume that the seller sent it dented. I plugged it in and it works but the bent fan is not that powerful. You'd have to pretty much have it mounted right over your cooking pot.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Led lights extremely DIM
customer_reviews.text: Luckily we plugged this in to check the LED LIGHTS. they were very dim and small. Fan noise was typical. But also arrived with a big dent on right side of hood. Also measurement was not 30 inches. But we returned it mostly due to very dim lights.
customer_reviews.author: Fufa

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but not useful.
customer_reviews.text: This hood looks great but is lacking in performance. Lighting is of no use . Too dim and no help in seeing what your cooking. The reusable filters seem to be a great feature. The lighting is a huge downfall if we hadnot installed it I would be returning it. We also had to install a longer cord. That making another expense.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit. The lights are Lame
customer_reviews.text: Its a well built unit. It comes prewired with a plug so I had to change the electrical set up to make it compatible with my set-up. I have lots of LED lights in my house, and these two are the lamest I have seen. They really provide no benefit what so ever. You would think the manufacturer would install something better given the quality of the rest of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice streamline look.
customer_reviews.text: It does have a nice streamline look about it. I purchased the stainless steel range hood and it matches perfectly with my appliances. The filters seam to be easy to clean. It is not excessively loud like the older models. Would be nice if it had two light options, High and low. The 2 lights are too dim.
customer_reviews.author: D&E Jones

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Practical, Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to remodel my kitchen due to water damage. The hood I had before was caked with oil and archaic, so I went for this one. The reviews are what drew me in, but after owning one myself, I can easily say it's got everything you could ask for in a vent. It's not the highest quality, but it's definitely a good bang for your buck. It's also stylish and not as loud as other hoods I've had. Highly recommend if you're looking for an affordable yet practical option.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works much better than the microwave ones!
customer_reviews.text: This came very well packaged and in great condition. It was very easy to install (only a few screws required) and is very efficient (I use it as a recirculating hood, and I bought the extra carbon filter for it). I finished the installation with a piece of stainless steel to hide the mess that was behind the microwave. All in all, I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Good fan looks nice. 👍
customer_reviews.text: It came packaged very well and it looks really nice. The fan is not what I would call quiet but it's not obnoxiously loud either. It's not super powerful,it's not gonna pull in all the steam or stink but for the price point it does the job. The only thing I do not like at all is the super dinner LED lights. They are so dim! Other than that it's a great looking fan for 100 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Y. maxie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about getting the wrong one. Our home was built in the 90's and the old one was vented from a 6 inch circle from the top. I was pleased to find this one could be vented from the top or the back. A quick run to home depot and I was able to get the adapter to fit the rectangle shape of the vent to the huge circle pipe venting through my ceiling. We had to cut some of the wood out under the cabinets to fit the longer angle but it is in now and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Affordable but below average...
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty and looks modern an nice, but, it doesn’t vent as well as I thought it would. It’s very average or below. Also, the halogen lighting is so dim, I can’t see when I cook, and the bulbs aren’t easy to find or change. Bette off buying a Braun brand or another well known brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kaden

customer_reviews.title: Great hood on a budget
customer_reviews.text: This does the job if you’re wanting a hood on a budget. The one we really wanted was around $270, and we just couldn’t justify the price right now for a hood. We settled on this one after reading some reviews and it was the right choice! Installation from the top is much easier if you remove the lights so you can see where the screws should attach. We haven’t used it a ton yet, but it seems to pull the air fairly well when we’ve tested it. The light is pretty much useless, but could be used for a bit of light at night. Overall, we’re happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: The product by itself looks good, no damage. Just not sure if the item shipped was a returned item ot not. After opening the box, it did not have a manual nor screws, which I would think, anything that is bought that needs attachment is supplied with screws. I did not want to return the item, since, I need it badly, so I just had to purchase the screws separately.
customer_reviews.author: ai

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but they need to do something on installation instructions
customer_reviews.text: There are no clear set instructions on how to install this unit. Just a couple cardboard cutouts that really didn't work all that well for my installation. The unit itself though was an extreme bargain looks very nice, and I compare that to the two to $300 units they were trying to sell me at The Big Box store.
customer_reviews.author: Jay H

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hood vent to replace an old one after purchasing a new stove. It is very nice but plain. Only a few buttons but enough to take care of the job. I would purchase again because of the way it works and the way it looks. It does a good job exhausting odors. It is a little loud but not over bearing. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Mangum

customer_reviews.title: Give me some lighting
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad fan for the money but the allumination is comparable to a night light. Very low lumens at 1.5 watt it should be a 4 watt system plus the lights have an opaque cover which dulls them further. A real let down when your trying to brighten up the kitchen. *UPDATE remove the white cover by removing the metal ring tab... much brighter!!
customer_reviews.author: John T Graff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stainless Range hood
customer_reviews.text: We shopped long and hard for a stainless range hood. This one is wonderful. The fan works quickly to get rid of smoke, steam and odors. The lights are perfect and light up the entire stove cooktop.
customer_reviews.author: lisa k

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Range Hood-Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: This 30" Cosmo hood delivers! It's both stylish & functional. It was easy to install (although I needed to add an outlet box as the hood I replaced was hardwired). And, unlike some of the reviews I read before purchasing, this hood is much quieter than my old one, and the 2W LED lights are more than sufficient to illuminate the top of my range. Plus, nobody believes the price that I paid. I selected the ductless option, and the suction does seem a bit stronger on the right filter-vs-the left, but it functions fine. And, at 250 CFM it's quite a value when looking at other available hoods.
customer_reviews.author: Marc G.

customer_reviews.title: PRICE
customer_reviews.text: tried several much more expensive range hoods, all failed terribly. ordered this beauty went in like a charm. fan noise very quiet on low, med a bit loud on high but not deafening. great product, price. highly recommend for an inexpensive range hood
customer_reviews.author: Dennis W.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the hood over my stove, it really removes the smoke/steam from the cook top. It's a bit noisy but not more then other hoods. It took a long time to receive it (10weeks) and then it looked like it was used as the white film was already taken off. However, there were no marks to complain about we just had to take extra care when installing it. We also had to purchase a plug as our house had an outlet and we didn't want to rewire the appliance into the wall, a trip to the hardware store and 1.99 took care of the issue. Overall purchase was worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: brenda list

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I Love the Design and the power of it but the lights are a joke. It's more of a blueish color light that does not help you see what you cook whatsoever. They are LED's so therefore I thought they will out out quite some light but was honestly really disappointed when I turned them on. Other than that I love it especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: stogie

customer_reviews.title: WOW that sucks!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found Cosmo range hood. It looks great and the fan sound level is amazing! With the fan on high speed it will take out any smoke from cooking, and will not make you deaf in the process. Don't think I will use the high fan setting, if I need extra vacuum power I have it at a touch of a button. The low fan setting is going to be great to take out any smoke or heat that comes from cooking. the lights are good, wish a little brighter. for the cost its exelet. The only problem I see with this hood is WHY DID I NOT BUY IT SOONER!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my kitchen remodel. High quality product . I felt that it was very easy to install and was surprised at how quiet it is even on high speed the fan remains very quiet. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bassman

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and look, the LED LIGHT are more of a night light instead of a cooking light, using mine as a non vented. Time Will tell on durability. The squared front corners look good but cabinet doors now hit when fully opened, as with the old vent that tapered in the doors never hit.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, works fine, looks good
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and fits my space perfectly, it was hard to find a good slim hood that would fit under my cabinets. I was slightly disappointed in the blower power but it gets the job done fine on the highest setting. The lights are very dim, which I was expecting based on other reviews on here but some people said they were fine so I figured I didn't care that much. They are indeed very dim, not very useful at all, I've decided to just put some cheap LED strip lights under there for when I actually need light.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McNamara

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: great looking hood that works well with suction power better than the microwave it replaced very easy install the first unit came with a strange cut -like scratch that was so perfect line that it must be a factory defect easy replacement with amazon and the new unit is great
customer_reviews.author: Lg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, looks nice, light is not that bright
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new range hood for our kitchen. The installation process was smooth and easy. The design looks really nice with our other stainless steel appliances. It's not as quite as finger prints free as I expected but it's not too bad with proper upkeep. It's pretty quiet on the lowest setting, but even with the highest suction setting, we couldn't hear it from our bedroom. One thing I wish it would be better at is the lighting. It's too dim for me to actually use as cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, easy installation, just as described
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly, installed easily. Fit just fine with the existing 3.25x10 duct. The only thing that I would like more is if the LED lights were a warm light rather than the cold white they are. They don’t like up the kitchen but do serve their purpose. I am hoping to find replacement lights that are a warmer light. Also has a knockout so you can reroute the power cord if needed
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Best quality great price
customer_reviews.text: You are either going to spend too much or too little if you buy another product. This model range hood was high quality despite the low price. The suction was sufficient to draw vapors 16 feet up to expel out of a outlet in the roof. Our family uses it almost every day for three meals a day and have never had a problem in a year and a half. You had better by this quick before they realize what a great product it is and raise the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: For the money I'm happy . been using now couple months and I don't have any complaints .install is easy .use the temp plate and measure few times to get it right first time. It's light weight so easy to mount
customer_reviews.author: Michael walsh

customer_reviews.title: Terrible lights
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but not very functional hood. Lights are pathetic, no other word for it. Less output than a nightlight and cheap color temp. Fan blew half the air down and half up.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Dimmest lights imaginable
customer_reviews.text: What I only needed from this product was lighting. I am a serious cook and handicapped without good lighting in the kitchen. Our hood had to be replaced, but this product doesn't provide enough light. Two lights give off the dimmest glow, similar to a night light, but even dimmer. If you need light, don't buy this! It's installed now, so we're looking at other lighting options..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks good, works as expected
customer_reviews.text: It fit the space where the old one was, works fine. The LED lights are a bit harsh, but OK. The directions for installation are a bit thin on the ground, but it's pretty evident that you need to hook up the power, screw the thing in place and hook up the exhaust pipe. Aluminum duct tape is your friend here.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Gee

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works quite well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my original range vent. This one in stainless steel looks really nice and it’s a lot quieter than my previous one. I do wish that the lights were a little brighter. That’s my only comment. It was easy to install as we just took the old one away and put the new one up.
customer_reviews.author: Wineoh

customer_reviews.title: Lights too dim, suction too weak.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Looks great, easy to install Cons: Suction is barely there, enough to force open the external flapper on the vent, but not really suck in much steam from a boiling pot of water, even worse, the lights are SOOOO dim - like I'm talking dimmer than a night-light, useless for actually brightening up the range top cook area.
customer_reviews.author: MikeB.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking range hood that goes either way.
customer_reviews.text: Professional stainless steel look. As far as fans go, relatively quiet and it exhausts at an upward angle (and not in your face). Can be installed duct{full,less}. 3 foot pre-installed 3-way electrical wire already included. Fairly easy installation when going ductless. BUT the lights suck -- better off as a night light. For real lighting, I bought a rechargeable magnetic LED light stick and placed it between the 2 lame pods.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Brutman

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, But looks expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I installed the Cosmo 30” in a mobile home and it was an easy install. Yes the stainless steel feels a little flimsy, but it does look great after install. You can’t beat the price. It was affordable for my in-laws whom are retired and the unit helped them save $$, of course I installed for the for free. It’s always good to vent outside, but if you can’t it comes with the carbon filter for venting inside. The led lights are pretty bright and can see everything they are cooking. All an all it is a good unit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Poor lighting.
customer_reviews.text: Although my hood vent may be a bit higher than others, the lighting is so poor that there’s no point in even turning it on. I read the reviews and the people that say the lighting was great must have it 6 inches over there stove because I don’t see how we have the same unit and they had good lighting and I have horrible lighting. The suction is good however, and the noise level is not horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The unit that was sent to me had a rectangular rear duct opening when the pictures show a round one. I ordered all the supplies for the contractor in anticipation of the round opening. Such a waste of time zzzzz.
customer_reviews.author: StuDizzzLe

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Led Lights are built in and are useless. They are insanely dim, and you can't just go buy a brighter bulb, because they're built-in. But I can love with that. What I can't live with is that its crap, every time I cook bacon, or anything else the smoke from cooking goes to the front of the hood where the light is and out into my house smoking it up. It literally doesn't suck up it into the filters, and just streams into the house. And that's cooking on the very back burner. I had such high hopes because it looks fantastic in my kitchen. I strongly do not suggest purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Benner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. It's loud, does little if anything to control odors, lights are so dim they're practically useless. The light switch works maybe one out of 10 times I try to turn it on, and the unit had a ding & a faint scratch on the front when it came out of the box. If it wasn't already installed I'd return it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fit, great speeds, lights are rather dim, great unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great speeds and using recirculated venting into house. Taped openings to ensure all air would exit vents on top. Only issue I have is the lights are rather dim for my older eyes. I've not investigated whether I can replace with brighter lights at this point. Great unit for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product. The item came as described and functions perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I ordered this hood because we purchased a new stove. We updated our old nutone hood that didn't seem to be removing any steam or odors. The item came as described on damaged great shipping speed. After I installed it with simply using 4 screws it functioned flawlessly! I'm so glad we purchased this hood and it looks great with our new set up.
customer_reviews.author: Swgonzo

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase ever! This thing is such a piece of crap, they don't even want it back. They give you 30 days to return it. We were in the middle of a renovation when I ordered it, of course we ran into problems so the hood didn't get installed until after the 30 days. Hated it from the get go and manufacturer DOES NOT SEND BRIGHTER BULBS. It feels greasy no matter what you clean it with. It's junk and I wasted my money on this. Going to have to replace it. So upset over this because neither Amazon or Cosmo will make this right.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Husband installed this pretty quickly and it's perfect. Like the option to recirculate back into the room with a filter because our original ducting vented down through the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Belindy

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: Good quality fan, great price and features. The LED lights put even lighting down onto the stove (watch out for those hoods that use rear lighting). Fan works great, so far no complaints after 3 months. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: john ortquist

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product was very easy to install. However, if you are replacing an old range hood that is 30 inches, this one is only 29 and a half inches. This leaves a little gap on the side. No big deal to me, but it may be do some. Just something to think about.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marfori

customer_reviews.title: The hood looks nice and works well
customer_reviews.text: I installed the hood with no problems. The item came on time and was packaged so there was no damage at all. The hood looks nice and works well. The lights are good and especially like the full grease filters that cover the entire bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet fan - large grease filters
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my noisy range hood with this stainless steel model. The fan is quiet. The LED lights are nice. My unit came with a sturdy cord. I added a duplex outlet, using the previous fan power, to plug it into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Idahodian

customer_reviews.title: Recieved a "returned" product
customer_reviews.text: When I pulled this hood out of the box, the packaging was ripped, the blue covering was ripped, and it was filthy. I did not pay $110 for a hood someone rejected.
customer_reviews.author: RN Davis

customer_reviews.title: Could use more fixing holes
customer_reviews.text: Installation would have been much easier if a mounting template were provided rather than just providing a set of metric measurements in the manual. The manual gives the wrong dimension for the top, it is only 12 inches and not 14 inches. I had to add some more fixing screws close to the front edge of the cabinet to prevent flexing. If you have DIY skills you can manage the installation.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES!!!  BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit for our new kitchen remodel. Contractor just installed it. The lights (if you can call them lights) are TOTALLY INSUFFICIENT. There is almost no discernible lighting. When I called the manufacturer they said sorry, but the product literature says it is 2 watts of lighting. Certainly was not something I understand from their product description which just includes '2x2w' LED. Didn't understand that it was 'wattage'. Cosmo said nothing we can do. It is TOTALLY POORLY DESIGNED PRODUCT AND OF NO USE. TAKING IT OUT AND FINDING SOMETHING USEFUL. My advise: DON'T BUY IT UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Kirk

product_meta.title: Cosmo 5U30 30 in. Under Cabinet Range Hood with Ducted / Ductless Convertible Slim Kitchen Over Stove Vent, 3 Speed Exhaust Fan, Reusable Filter, LED Lights in Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Style:HoodCosmo’s new and improved COS-5U30 Under Cabinet Range Hood has modern sharp styling for any kitchen decor. Featured in brushed stainless steel, efficient airflow removes smells and odors with ease. Two dishwasher-safe aluminum mesh filters collect unwanted grease and oil from the air. Push-button controls make using hood a breeze; choose from 3 fan speeds for the right amount of suction. Built-in energy-efficient LED lighting ensures visibility for cooking at all times of the day.
feature_bullets: SLIM SPACE-SAVING DESIGN: Slim profile saves space. Installation under cabinetry makes it great for condos and apartments. Convert to ductless with optional Carbon Filter Kit (Part # CFK3-TM). Suitable for top OR back venting
EFFICIENT YET QUIET: 3-speed motor, 56dB max. Cosmo’s vent hood filters your kitchen without the loudness and sounds of competing range hoods

SUPERIOR FILTRATION: Durable reusable aluminum mesh filters included to trap grease and oil. Multi-layer filters trap grease more effectively. 2 exhaust ports are available to fit a variety of different homes and configurations

QUALITY: 20 gauge brushed stainless steel, 430-grade for unparalleled quality; Easy push-button controls; 2x 2-Watt LED lights for better visibility and energy savings; Popular 30 inch size fits most homes

5 YEAR LIMITED PARTS: Our customer support team is based proudly in the USA. Product Dimensions: 29.5" (W) x 18.8" (D) x 5.3" (H). Electrical Requirements: 120V / 60Hz, 3-Prong Plug. Duct Size: Round 4 3/4"

specifications.Included Components: Multi-layer Mesh Filters, Backdraft Damper, Mounting Kit & Manual
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars815 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
